text: Abner is a Hebrew name that signifies "father of light" or "my father is a light." It has been commonly used by Jewish families for many generations. The name Abner appears multiple times in the Bible and is linked with qualities like bravery, power, and guidance. == People == * Abner Coburn (1803–1885), 30th governor of Maine * Abner Cole (1783–1835), American newspaper editor * Abner Cook (1814-1884), Texas architect and general contractor ==References== Category:Names
title: Abner
